Doing the dishes! You are shut away in a dish"corner"all day, and you just work your way through mounds and mounds of dirty dishes, and everytime it seems like you are almost done, someone comes and drops another pile off right next to you and says"here ya go!"as if you're happy to see them or something -_- I hate dishes. I worked in fast food, and I wouldn't say that the drive-through was bad. The worst part, in my opinion, would have to be cleaning, whether it's cleaning up spills from messy customers or mopping grease off the floor. Every day I went home feeling dirty and smelling like fry grease. Thanks goodness I never had to clean restrooms. I don't envy the people with that job either. Many years ago I worked at a fastfood place and for me the worst job there was the drive-thru window. I worked the 10 pm to 6 am shift and around 3 am all the bars were closing down and the people wanted food. It seemed every car was full of intoxicated people that didn't know what they wanted.
